timeline.bodyText: People used have debug(format, args) to avoid unnecessary string concatenation in case debug wasn't enabled.
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: @aloubyansky but debug(format, args) would still process the args (ex: list map and join)
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: Sure, if debug is actually enabled.
replies.author: aloubyansky
